full_description:
Marsriva MR-US1K Energy Efficient 1kVA Online UPS

The Marsriva MR-US1K Energy Efficient 1kVA Online UPS is a reliable and powerful power backup device that provides uninterrupted power for various devices and appliances. With a high capacity of 1KVA / 1KW, it supports various devices and appliances, including computers, servers, routers, printers, TVs, and fans. The UPS has a stable output voltage of 208v ~ 240V, compatible with most electrical standards and devices. The Marsriva MR-US1K Energy Efficient 1kVA Online UPS features an online topology, high frequency double conversion online with DSP control, short circuit and overcharge protection, and a high output power factor of 1.0 PF. The UPS also features an LCD display for easy monitoring and control. The energy-efficient design reduces power consumption and heat generation, and the long battery life ensures backup power for up to 24 hours when mains power fails or drops below a certain level. The battery management system optimizes battery performance and lifespan by monitoring and controlling charging and discharging processes. Overall, the Marsriva MR-US1K Energy Efficient 1 kVA Online UPS is a powerful and reliable power backup device.
